text: Dr. Harshal is an outstanding family physician—knowledgeable, attentive, and truly dedicated to his patients. He always takes the time to listen, offers clear and thorough explanations, and shows genuine care for our well-being. Appointments never feel rushed, and his ongoing support has made a real difference. I highly recommend him to anyone seeking compassionate and high-quality medical care.

We have been consulting Dr. Harshal since last one year. He always offers honest, practical advice and suggests the most cost effective medical care (tests & medicines). The location of this clinic is very convenient and easy to reach. I highly recommend everyone  to visit this clinic atleast once.

Excellent Doctor and Excellent staff they support and extend their help is each and every way..
Doctor Harshal is best and hear you very passionately and his medicine works from 1st dose.
Highly recommended…
Thanks a lot and my gratitude for your service to community..

Dr.Harshal is an exceptional family doctor—skilled, attentive, and always takes the time to listen. They provide clear explanations and genuinely care about their patients’ well-being. We never feel rushed during appointments, and his support has been invaluable. Highly recommend for anyone looking for excellent care with a compassionate approach!

We have been visiting Dr. Harshal for quite some time now. He is very patient, humble and most importantly skilled at his profession as a GP. His diagnosis is almost always accurate and doesnt overload with medicines. Highly recommended!
